note.p: Daughter of Richard Shepley esquire and his wife Lydia; baptised at St Marylebone, Middlesex. Her niece Rosamond Margaret Jane Wilson married August Wilhelm von Hofmann in 1856. Resident at 24 Park Square East, London, in 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/178/34/21)
London, England, baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 March 2013)
